title: 黑警專拉後生靚女?Hong Kong Police Target Young Pretty Girls?

replies.msg:
Hong Kong Police Target Young Pretty Girl-Protesters克警候實後生靚女? By Chapman Chen, HKBNews
Hong Kong Police again arrested 2 young pretty female protesters at Castle Peak Bay around 17:50 today (9.21). Denied bail, they will have to stay in Castle Peak Police Station for 48 hrs. Civilians launched a "Retrieve Tuen Mun" march today, which was dispersed by the police with tear gas and sponge rounds. The demonstrators were then chased to Castle Peak Road. Indeed, Hong Kong police often target young nice-looking girls. E.g., on Sept 15, at Fortress Hill, a good-figured young girl in a jogging T-shirt and shorts was taken away by a group of cops in a private car UY2745. On Aug10, an air stewardess, who happened to pass by Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, was sexually assaulted and arrested by a group of anti-riot policemen.

On Aug 23, a girl protester, accompanied by lawmaker Tanya Chan, publicly complained that after the police arrested her, she was stripped naked for body-search, and her private part was poked with a pen, with a number of male cops peeping into the room.


"Gang rape has really occurred in San Uk Ling Detention Center!" Dr. CHAN Sze Chi, Senior Lecturer, Dept of Religion & Philosophy, Hong Kong Baptist University, wrote on his Facebook on Sept 14, "20 girls are now in a certain hospital in the New Territories. Every single one of them have 3 sexually transmitted diseases inside the body! A female minister of the church just went to see them."


Pic creditrint screens from NOW TV Live.


FB link: https://www.facebook.com/hongkongbilingualnews/posts/774758232961943?__tn__=-R
#extraditionlaw #hongkongpolicebrutality #ccp #hongkonghumanrightsanddemocracyact #chapmanchen #sanukling #marcorubiol #trump2020

replies.msg: 今日拉兩少女罪名：非法集結（百搭罪），藏攻擊性武器（雷射筆）。The two girls today were arrested for unlawful assembly and possession of offensive weapons (laser pointer).
點解佢地唔 target 大媽?
